title: Tile, mid-18th century
dimensions: H x W x D (laying flat): 12.6 x 12.6 cm (4 15/16 x 4 15/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Square tile. Center reserved in white, with male figure in Chinese style, manganese and blue, standing on green and yellow mound. Blue border with double row of black circles and dots; flower quadrants at the corners.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Tin-Enamelled earthenware. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1938-12-4.
